attributes.action: MAKE FORMULA 1 AN FREE TO AIR SPORT
attributes.additional_details: FORMULA 1 SHOULD BE A FREE TO AIR SPORT AND NOT TO BE MOVED TO SKY. BBC RATEING ARE AT AN ALL TIME HIGH AND THIS IS WHAT WE PAY ARE TV LICENCE FOR. BBC GIVE UNINTERUPTED COVERAGE OF THE RACES. I WOULD LIKE THE GOVERNMENT TO MAKE FORMULA 1 A FREE TO AIR SPORT AS THIS IS NOT FAIR ON THE FANS. PLEASE STOP SKY TAKING THIS SPORT AWAY. PEOPLE CAN NOT AFFORD SKY(LIKE MYSELF) AND WHY SHOULD THEY PAY FOR SKY SPORTS WHEN THEY ONLY WANT TO WATCH FORMULA 1. PLEASE DO NOT LET SKY TAKE THIS AWAY. THE BBC DO A LOVELY JOB WITH FORMULA 1.
